attributes.action: formally recognise the town of Wooten Basset.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to call for a formal recognition of the contribution made by the town, and the people of, Wooten Bassett in honouring the repatriated heroes of her majesties armed forces.  Ideally by lobbying for her majesty to give the royal seal. "Royal Wooten Bassett" has a certain ring.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
